cause.description:
We believe that gay people in Lebanon should have the right to live and exist not in fear but in a safe environment, not in hiding or oppression but in equality and harmony. Please speak, and let your voice be heard. Let us fight for the rights of any human being to live. Gay rights are civil rights.
Starting July 23, 2008: Spam and advertisements are no longer tolerated on the wall of this cause, they crowd the place, so let's keep our wall clean (advertising other campaigns could be considered as spam and your message could be subject to immediate deletion).
Sincere apologies for any inconvenience, GRIL
(current logo idea designed by Richard, 2009)
1. equality
2. tolerance
3. acceptance
4. kicking homophobic ass
cause.mission: equal rights for gay people in Lebanon.
cause.name: Gay Rights in Lebanon
